Posts.Content: Hi, first time here. Just need some support.  I’m just coming into day 6 post op, lumpectomy and SNB. Feeling violated and in far more pain than I ever anticipated. BN said it was minor op so I wasn’t too worried, just wanted it out, but the pain and post op blues getting to me now. Also the impact of the whole BC thing starting to hit me. Lump picked up in screening and I feel like I’ve been on a surreal path ever since.  The nerve pain in my upper arm woke me up again and the dragging feeling in my armpit is hideous when I walk or sit up.  Has anyone else had the dragging pain? It feels like someone is trying to pull my armpit out.  I’m sure I’m not alone but apart from the dawn chorus outside I’m feeling it.  Tearful and overwhelmed.  Emily
Posts.Title: SNB post op nerve pain and dragging

Posts.Content: Awe thanks for your replies everyone.  Thanks to co codamol I did eventually drop off again!  Everything seems worse in the middle of the night!  Seeing nurse for post op today so will discuss the pain with her.  Thanks again. Xxx
Posts.Title: SNB post op nerve pain and dragging
